problem: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,AC,BD交于点O,过点O作EF∥AD交AB于点E,F,若AE=2,BE=5,OD=3,则BD长为()
comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例,掌握平行线所分线段对应成比例是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AD ∥ BC, AC, BD intersect at point O, and pass through O to draw EF ∥ AD intersects AB at points E, F, if AE = N_0, BE = N_1, OD = N_2, then the length of BD is ()
